front-end-mentor.title: Frontend Mentor Challenges
front-end-mentor.description: A collection of Frontend Mentor challenges, showcasing various UI designs and frontend development skills.

rest-countries-app.title: REST Countries App
rest-countries-app.description: A web application that fetches country data from the REST Countries API, displaying details with dark/light mode support.

weather-app.title: Weather App
weather-app.description: A simple weather app that fetches real-time weather data using OpenWeather API.

civil-society-organization.title: Civil Society Organization (CSO) Website (INESP Brasil)
civil-society-organization.description: Developed an online portal for the non-profit organization Instituto de Espetáculos Públicos do Brasil (Inesp Brasil).

lyricat.title: LyriCat
lyricat.description: An application that translates songs to Brazilian Portuguese and provides AI-powered explanations of their meanings and contexts.

quick-alias.title: Quick Alias
quick-alias.description: A browser extension that allows you to create custom text shortcuts (aliases) preceded by '/' to quickly insert predefined texts.
